meanings.sent1: The overornamented dress sparkled with too many jewels.
meanings.sent2: The room looked overornamented with too many paintings on the walls.
meanings.sent3: The cake was so overornamented with frosting that it looked more like a sculpture than a dessert.
meanings.sent4: Her speech was overornamented with flowery language, making it hard to understand her main point.
meanings.sent5: The garden was overornamented with colorful gnomes and wind chimes, creating a chaotic visual display.

meanings.sent1: The overornamented Christmas tree almost touched the ceiling with its excessive decorations.
meanings.sent2: The overornamented cake collapsed under the weight of the numerous sugary flowers on top.
meanings.sent3: The overornamented car had so many stickers that it looked like a moving advertisement.
meanings.sent4: The overornamented gift box was so heavy with ribbons and bows that it was hard to lift.
meanings.sent5: The overornamented costume was so elaborate that the actor could barely move on stage.

meanings.sent1: The overornamented necklace was so heavy that it weighed down her neck.
meanings.sent2: The overornamented house was a mishmash of different architectural styles.
meanings.sent3: The overornamented phone case had so many charms that it jingled with every movement.
meanings.sent4: The overornamented wedding cake was a towering masterpiece of sugar flowers and lace.
meanings.sent5: The overornamented outfit was a clash of patterns and colors, drawing attention wherever she went.
